description:
Enjoy the 100% ad-free version of Beat the Traffic!

Beat the Traffic® is the easiest way to enjoy a hassle-free commute in the USA and Canada.

Quickly check the latest road traffic conditions in your area and discover the best route to take to avoid traffic jams!



► Features:

- 100% ad-free.
- Real-time traffic maps showing speeds & incidents
- GPS displays traffic jams near you.
- Detailed incidents & roadwork reports.
- Traffic camera images in over 33 cities.



Live traffic cameras are accessible in 33 cities:
New York City, Houston, Atlanta, Toronto, Phoenix, Seattle, San Bernardino, Minneapolis, Denver, Portland, Sacramento, San Antonio, Providence, Nashville, Memphis, Louisville, Hartford, Buffalo, Salt Lake City, Raleigh-Durham, Tucson, Fresno, New Haven, Omaha, Bakersfield, Boise, Chattanooga, Redding, Macon, Beaverton, Chico.



Follow us on Twitter and Facebook for news updates and fun facts:

http://www.facebook.com/beatthetraffic
http://www.twitter.com/btt3d
versionNote:
- Allow device rotation.
- Minor bug fixes.
